Please assist on the following:

*	Tracer action report
*	Short landing certificate from concerned authority (police/ customs/ terminal operator/ stevedores etc.) 
*	Weight slips from each source: from the source warehouse, source port, destination port and the destination warehouse.
*	Customs Receipt - at source 
*	Immediate notice of loss against carriers (or the local agents of the carriers) – should be sent as early as June 02, 2025
*	Details of contact person and location (if a Loss Adjuster is to be appointed) 
*	Highlight the claimed items from the invoice

 

Please note, that we have also appointed Navtech to assist with the survey.

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

Best Regards,
